description:
Krokorok, known as the Desert Croc Pok√©mon, is the evolved form of Sandile. They live in small groups. Because the special membrance covering its eyeballs can sense the warmth from objects, it can see its surroundings even in the dark.
In the anime, a Krokorok with sunglasses is currently a recurring character which was originally introduced as a Sandile that evolves in a battle with Ash`s Pikachu. It was later caught by Ash.
name: Waruvile
